title: PrimeLodgeBookify
description: A seamless hotel room booking platform where users can view details, book rooms, leave reviews, and manage their reservations. Experience smarter, more seamless hotel booking with our modern platform—designed for today’s travelers.
challenges: Implementing secure booking logic with availability checks, date conflicts, and Firebase-based route protection was challenging.
improvements: Plan to integrate payment gateway, enhance review filtering, and add SMS booking confirmations.

title: Roommate.Finder
description: A user-friendly web app for posting and browsing roommate listings based on preferences like location, rent, lifestyle, and availability. A Roommate Finder Website that connects users with compatible roommates based on shared preferences.
challenges: Ensuring only owners could edit/delete listings securely and managing real-time updates was complex.
improvements: Future plans include chat integration, roommate compatibility quiz, and AI-based recommendation engine.

title: Smart Subscription
description: A subscription box service platform designed to help businesses manage recurring deliveries, billing, inventory, and user analytics. A subscription box platform for automated billing and curated products.
challenges: Creating a modular system that supports multiple subscription plans and dynamic inventory sync was challenging.
improvements: Planning admin analytics dashboards, invoice system, and third-party shipping API integration.
